description:
Shāng Bù Huàn has no intention of following the sly Lǐn Xuě Yā`s advice and helping in the quest to protect the mystical Tiān Xing Jiàn sword, but when finds himself targeted by the evil sect that is trying to take it, he finds he might not have a choice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attack of the Xuan Gui Zong!
